ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ تَٱللَّهِ تَفْتَؤُا۟ تَذْكُرُ يُوسُفَ حَتَّىٰ تَكُونَ حَرَضًا أَوْ تَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْهَٰلِكِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'By Allah, you will not ever cease to mention Yusuf, till you waste away or are among the people of the grave!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: By God," said they, "you will never stop thinking of Joseph till you are consumed or perish."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The sons said: "By Allah! You will continue to remember Joseph until you will either consume yourself with grief, or will die."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They said, "You are always remembering Joseph. By God, it will either make you sick or you will die".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “By Allah, you will keep remembering Yusuf till your health fails you or you lose your life.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "By Allah! You will never cease remembering Yusuf until you become weak with old age, or until you be of the dead."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: By Allah! you will not cease to remember Yusuf until you are a prey to constant disease or (until) you are of those who perish.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: By God,' they said, 'thou wilt never cease mentioning Joseph till thou art consumed, or among the perishing.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: By Allah, thou wilt never cease remembering Joseph till thy health is ruined or thou art of those who perish!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They said, "By God, will you keep on remembering Joseph until your health is ruined, and you die?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: by Allah! thou wilt not cease remembering Yusuf until thou art wizened or thou be of the dead.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘By Allah! You will go on remembering Joseph until you wreck your health or perish.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "By Allah! (never) wilt thou cease to remember Joseph until thou reach the last extremity of illness, or until thou die!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "By Allah! You will never cease remembering Yusuf (Joseph) until you become weak with old age, or until you be of the dead."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They said: 'By Allah, will you not cease to mention Joseph until you are consumed, or are among the perishing'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “By God, you will not stop remembering Joseph, until you have ruined your health, or you have passed away.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "By Allah, you will not cease remembering Joseph until you become fatally ill or become of those who perish."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [12:85] They said, ‘By God, you will never cease remembering Joseph until you are consumed, on the verge of perishing, on account of your illness (it [haradan, ‘consumed’] is a verbal noun equally [applicable] to one person or more) or you are of those who perish’, [of] the dead.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said) i.e. his children and his grandchildren: (By Allah, thou wilt never cease remembering Joseph till your health is ruined or you art of those who perish) through death!
